page.title: 11A CHILD'S VIEW
page.content: In Westhoughton there is a big{ {playing field}next to an{industrial {estate}.I think they should build a football pitch on it but they are thinking of{building houses}on it.Near the industrial estate there are some{ {ponds}where you can go fishing.We also have a{sports centre,a swimming {pool,and all sorts of shops}.One is a sports shop and there is a{market where you can buy plugs,lights,toffees vegetables,fruit,clothes,toys,cards, wrapping paper,books,and all sorts of things.We have got some{banks}_Lloyds, Barclays,T.S.B.,Nat.West.,and the Girobank. We have got a{Police_station,a {laundrette,a dentist,and a doctors' {surgery}. I think Westhoughton is a good place to live.
